sentences.literal: The world has many such, therefore not discussed.

sentences.chinese: 又嘗得神馬渥洼水中，復次以為太一之歌。
sentences.literal: Again once obtained divine horses in Wo Wa water, and furthermore made it into the Tai Yi song.

sentences.chinese: 歌曲曰：「太一貢兮天馬下，霑赤汗兮沫流赭。
sentences.literal: The song and lyrics say: 'Tai Yi contributes, heaven horse descends; moistened with red sweat, foam flows crimson.

sentences.chinese: 騁容與兮跇萬里，今安匹兮龍為友。」
sentences.literal: Galloping at ease, traversing ten thousand li; now what match, dragon as friend.'

sentences.chinese: 後伐大宛得千里馬，馬名蒲梢，次作以為歌。
sentences.literal: Later attacked Da Yuan and obtained thousand-li horses, horse named Pu Shao, furthermore made it into a song.

sentences.chinese: 歌詩曰：「天馬來兮從西極，經萬里兮歸有德。
sentences.literal: The song and poem say: 'Heaven horse comes from the western extreme; traverses ten thousand li and returns to one with virtue.

sentences.chinese: 承靈威兮降外國，涉流沙兮四夷服。」
sentences.literal: Receives spiritual might, descends to foreign countries; crosses flowing sands, four barbarians submit.'

sentences.chinese: 中尉汲黯進曰：「凡王者作樂，上以承祖宗，下以化兆民。
sentences.literal: The Commandant Ji An advanced and said: 'All kings who make music, above to receive ancestors, below to transform the myriad people.

sentences.chinese: 今陛下得馬，詩以為歌，協於宗廟，先帝百姓豈能知其音邪？」
sentences.literal: Now Your Majesty obtains horses, makes poems into songs, performs them in the ancestral temple; the former emperors and people, how could they know their sounds?'

sentences.chinese: 丞相公孫弘曰：「黯誹謗聖制，當族。」
sentences.literal: Chancellor Gongsun Hong said: 'An slanders the sacred system, should be executed along with his clan.'
All sounds that arise, are born from the human heart.
The human heart's movement, things make it thus.
Moved by things and thus acts, therefore takes form in sound;
Sounds respond to each other, therefore give rise to change;
